Producer: Bryan Bertino, Adrienne Biddle, Jason Blum, Ellen Goldsmith-Vein, Matthew Kaplan
Synopsis: A young girl is left alone in her house during a worldwide catastrophe and fearfully hides from a malevolent force that is stalking her. When her parents miraculously return, they try to settle back into normal life, but become increasingly concerned about something that has affected their daughter Stephanie.
Title: Stephanie
